title: xMatix Finance
subtitle: Govern financial execution in real time

hero.title: xMatix Finance
hero.description1: Control flows. Reduce risk. Improve visibility.
hero.description2: xMatix Finance helps organizations execute financial operations with discipline by embedding controls, approvals, and visibility directly into operational workflows.

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: Finance teams often operate after the fact, reconciling transactions once operational decisions are already made.

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Finance embeds financial governance directly into execution so every operational action follows financial policies in real time.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Finance modernizes financial execution without replacing existing ERP or accounting systems while improving control, compliance, and speed.

cardsData.title: Financial Workflow Execution
cardsData.description: Orchestrate approvals, postings, settlements, and adjustments through standardized workflows.

cardsData.title: Policy and Compliance Enforcement
cardsData.description: Apply financial rules, thresholds, and controls automatically during execution.

cardsData.title: Cross Functional Financial Alignment
cardsData.description: Align finance actions with sales, procurement, payroll, and operations execution.

cardsData.title: Exception Detection and Resolution
cardsData.description: Identify overruns, mismatches, and anomalies early and resolve them within governed processes.

cardsData.title: Audit and Reporting Readiness
cardsData.description: Maintain complete financial execution trails for audits, compliance, and reporting.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Finance in Action
requestADemo.description: Reduce financial risk, speed up approvals, and gain real time visibility into financial execution without disrupting existing systems.
